medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient, Mr. W, experienced a hip fracture after twisting suddenly while standing, which caused him to lose balance and fall onto a hard floor. Prior to the fracture, he ambulated with a 4-wheel walker and had no history of falls.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Congestive heart failure, chronic kidney disease, obstructive sleep apnea, asthma, gastroesophageal reflux disease, benign prostatic hyperplasia with urinary incontinence, sensorineural hearing loss, depression, mild cognitive impairment, vitamin D deficiency, chronic low back pain from lumbar spinal stenosis.
medical_history.social_history: Mr. W is an 89-year-old veteran; his social support system includes his wife, who is actively involved in his rehabilitation.
